content.raw: I have wondered if there are time zone related issue - Does AWS throttle resources  outside of business hours? Are we all using EDT time zone resources? I have not had any of the problems described since the upgrade, but was having InitializationFailed errors prior to that if I tried to start a simulation at ~8 pm EDT. To avoid that, I have not been starting sims after 4 pm EDT.
content.html: I have wondered if there are time zone related issue - Does AWS throttle resources outside of business hours? Are we all using EDT time zone resources? I have not had any of the problems described since the upgrade, but was having InitializationFailed errors prior to that if I tried to start a simulation at ~8 pm EDT. To avoid that, I have not been starting sims after 4 pm EDT.
